entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
